description.narrative: The most significant, expected project-level outcomes are economy wide impact and environmental effects from increased ethanol production as well as renewable energy sales. Beyond the Project, IFC anticipates that the investment has the potential to contribute to improving agricultural practices at the sector level and further strengthening its competitiveness through demonstration effect and replication.

The proposed investment consists of a senior loan of up to US$50 million composed by an A loan of US$30 million equivalent and a B loan of up to US$20 million, to support Usina Santa Adelia S.A.s (Santa Adelia or the Company) investment plan for the 2022 and 2023. Santa Adelia is a leading sugar, ethanol, and renewable energy producer in Brazil, with two mills located in the Sao Paulo state. The investment will support (i) sugarcane replanting; and (ii) development and implementation of irrigation systems (the Project).
